Protocols/SFMCEvent.html#/c:objc(pl)SFMC.name: -parameters
Protocols/SFMCEvent.html#/c:objc(pl)SFMC.abstract: Key value pair of data to be passed

Protocols/MarketingCloudSDKURLHandlingDe.name: -sfmc_handleURL:type:
Protocols/MarketingCloudSDKURLHandlingDe.abstract: This method, if implemented, can be called when a Alert+CloudPage, Alert+OpenDirect, Alert+Inbox or Inbox message is processed by the SDK.

Protocols/MarketingCloudSDKLocationDeleg.name: -sfmc_shouldShowLocationMessage:forRegion:
Protocols/MarketingCloudSDKLocationDeleg.abstract: Method called by the SDK when a Location message is ready to be shown. The delegate implementing this method returns YES or NO.

Protocols/MarketingCloudSDKEventDelegate.name: -sfmc_shouldShowInAppMessage:
Protocols/MarketingCloudSDKEventDelegate.abstract: Method called by the SDK when an In-App Message is ready to be shown. The delegate implementing this method returns YES or NO.

Protocols/MarketingCloudSDKEventDelegate.name: -sfmc_didShowInAppMessage:
Protocols/MarketingCloudSDKEventDelegate.abstract: Method called by the SDK when an In-App Message has been shown.

Protocols/MarketingCloudSDKEventDelegate.name: -sfmc_didCloseInAppMessage:
Protocols/MarketingCloudSDKEventDelegate.abstract: Method called by the SDK when an In-App Message has been closed.

Protocols/MarketingCloudSDKLocationDeleg.name: MarketingCloudSDKLocationDelegate
Protocols/MarketingCloudSDKLocationDeleg.abstract: Supporting protocol for the MobilePush SDK’s support for Locations.

Protocols/MarketingCloudSDKURLHandlingDe.name: MarketingCloudSDKURLHandlingDelegate
Protocols/MarketingCloudSDKURLHandlingDe.abstract: Supporting Protocol for handling URL’s passed to the SDK.

Protocols/SFMCEvent.html.name: SFMCEvent
Protocols/SFMCEvent.html.abstract: Required protocol for creating event objects to be passed into the SDK

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCFoundationRegistr.name: SFMCFoundationRegistrationResponseSucceededNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCFoundationRegistr.abstract: successfuly sent a registration to Salesforce - userinfo contains the HTTP response

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCFoundationUNNotif.name: SFMCFoundationUNNotificationReceivedNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCFoundationUNNotif.abstract: a UNNotification has been received - userInfo contains the UNNotificationRequest

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCInboxMessagesNoti.name: SFMCInboxMessagesNotificationHandledNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCInboxMessagesNoti.abstract: the Inbox handled a notification - userInfo contains the NSNotification userInfo

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCOpenDirectMessage.name: SFMCOpenDirectMessageNotificationHandledNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCOpenDirectMessage.abstract: an OpenDirect message was handled - userInfo contains the NSNotification userInfo

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCLocationDidFixLoc.name: SFMCLocationDidFixLocationNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCLocationDidFixLoc.abstract: a new location has been determined - userInfo contains the latitude and longitude

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCLocationDidReceiv.name: SFMCLocationDidReceiveLocationUpdateNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCLocationDidReceiv.abstract: an iOS location update has been received - userInfo contains the CLLocation

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCLocationGeofenceR.name: SFMCLocationGeofenceRefreshCompleteNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCLocationGeofenceR.abstract: successfuly received updated geo-fence messages from Salesforce

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCDidEnterLocationR.name: SFMCDidEnterLocationRegionMessageNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCDidEnterLocationR.abstract: entered a geo-fence region - userInfo contains region Id

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCDidExitLocationRe.name: SFMCDidExitLocationRegionMessageNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCDidExitLocationRe.abstract: exited a geo-fence region - userInfo contains region Id

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCDidDisplayLocatio.name: SFMCDidDisplayLocationMessageNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCDidDisplayLocatio.abstract: a geo-fence or beacon message has been displayed - userInfo contains the MC messageId

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCBeaconRefreshComp.name: SFMCBeaconRefreshCompleteNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCBeaconRefreshComp.abstract: successfuly received updated beacon messages from Salesforce

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCDidRangeBeaconLoc.name: SFMCDidRangeBeaconLocationMessageNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCDidRangeBeaconLoc.abstract: ranged a beacon - userInfo contains UUID, major, minor, and proximity

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCLocationDidStartM.name: SFMCLocationDidStartMonitoringForRegionNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCLocationDidStartM.abstract: started monitoring a geo-fence or beacon region - userInfo contains region Id

Constants.html#/c:@MarketingCloudSDKInbo.name: MarketingCloudSDKInboxMessageKey
Constants.html#/c:@MarketingCloudSDKInbo.abstract: key used in notification payload to determine an inbox message’s content

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCURLTypeCloudPage.name: SFMCURLTypeCloudPage
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCURLTypeCloudPage.abstract: These type constants are used by sfmc_handleURL:type: to indicate the MarketingCloud source of the URL

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCURLTypeOpenDirect.name: SFMCURLTypeOpenDirect
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCURLTypeOpenDirect.abstract: These type constants are used by sfmc_handleURL:type: to indicate the MarketingCloud source of the URL

Constants.html#/c:@SFMCURLTypeAction.name: SFMCURLTypeAction
Constants.html#/c:@SFMCURLTypeAction.abstract: These type constants are used by sfmc_handleURL:type: to indicate the MarketingCloud source of the URL

Classes/SFMCEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)SFMCEv.name: +customEventWithName:
Classes/SFMCEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)SFMCEv.abstract: Method to return a custom event with key.

Classes/SFMCEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)SFMCEv.name: +customEventWithName:withAttributes:
Classes/SFMCEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)SFMCEv.abstract: Method to return a custom event with key and parameters.

Classes/SFMCEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)SFMCEv.name: +parseAndTrim:
Classes/SFMCEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)SFMCEv.abstract: Parse and trim parameters for event creation. Validate key, trim, drop if criteria not met.

Classes/SFMCEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)SFMCEv.name: +validateAndPrepareKey:
Classes/SFMCEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)SFMCEv.abstract: Validate and prepare the key to meet requirements.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.name: -sfmc_build
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.abstract: Creates a NSDictionary containing the current builder configuration settings. This can be passed to the MarketingCloudSDK sfmc_configureWithDictionary method(s)

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.name: -sfmc_setApplicationId:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.abstract: Sets the configuration value to use for the Salesforce MarketingCloud Application ID.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.name: -sfmc_setAccessToken:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.abstract: Sets the configuration value to use for the Salesforce MarketingCloud Tenant accessToken.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.name: -sfmc_setLocationEnabled:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.abstract: Sets the configuration flag that enables or disables location services

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.name: -sfmc_setInboxEnabled:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.abstract: Sets the configuration flag that enables or disables inbox services

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.name: -sfmc_setPiAnalyticsEnabled:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.abstract: Sets the configuration flag that enables or disables Salesforce Predictive Intelligence analytics services

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.name: -sfmc_setUseLegacyPIIdentifier:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.abstract: Sets the configuration flag that enables or disables Salesforce Predictive Intelligence email override

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.name: -sfmc_setAnalyticsEnabled:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.abstract: Sets the configuration flag that enables or disables Salesforce MarketingCloud Analytics services

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.name: -sfmc_setMid:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.abstract: Sets the configuration value to use for the Salesforce MarketingCloud Tenant Specific mid.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.name: -sfmc_setMarketingCloudServerUrl:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.abstract: Sets the configuration value to use for the Salesforce MarketingCloud Tenant Specific Url.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.name: -sfmc_setApplicationControlsBadging:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.abstract: Sets the configuration value which enables or disables application control over badging

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.name: -sfmc_setDelayRegistrationUntilContactKeyIsSet:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder.h.abstract: Sets the configuration value which enables or disables application control over delaying SDK registration until a contact key is set

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKInboxMessagesDe.name: -initWithMarketingCloudSDK:tableView:dataSource:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKInboxMessagesDe.abstract: Create an instance of a basic UITableView delegate to handle cell selection for a simple view controller showing Inbox messages.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKInboxMessagesDa.name: -initWithMarketingCloudSDK:tableView:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKInboxMessagesDa.abstract: Create an instance of a basic UITableView data source to handle all loading for a simple view controller showing Inbox messages.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -init
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: UNAVAILABLE - please use the sharedInstance class method to get an instance of the SDK

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: +sharedInstance
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns (or initializes) the shared MarketingCloudSDK instance.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_configureWithDictionary:error:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: This is the main configuration method, responsible for setting credentials needed to communicate with Salesforce. You must pass in the NSDictionary created by the MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder sfmc_build method. Use the MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder class to specify the configuration parameter settings needed by your project. Settings that are absent will default to NO. The following example shows how you can use the MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder class to create the configuration dictionary.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_configureWithDictionary:error:completionHandler:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: This is the main configuration method, responsible for setting credentials needed to communicate with Salesforce. You must pass in the NSDictionary created by the MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder sfmc_build method. Use the MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder class to specify the configuration parameter settings needed by your project. Settings that are absent will default to NO. The following example shows how you can use the MarketingCloudSDKConfigBuilder class to create the configuration dictionary.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_tearDown
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: this method properly closes down the MarketingCloudSDK. It should be used in any cases where references to the MarketingCloudSDK need to be released.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_setContactKey:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Accepts and sets the Contact Key for the device’s user. Formerly know in the SDK as “subscriberKey”.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_contactKey
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns the contact key for the active user, in case you need it.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_addTag:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Adds the provided Tag (NSString) to the set of unique tags.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_removeTag:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Removes the provided Tag (NSString) from the list of tags.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_addTags:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Adds the provided array of Tags (NSString) to the set of unique tags.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_removeTags:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Removes the provided array of Tags (NSString) from the list of tags.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_tags
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns the list of tags for this device.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_setAttributeNamed:value:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Set an attribute to the data set sent to Salesforce.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_clearAttributeNamed:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Removes the named attribute from the data set to send to Salesforce. The value is not changed on the SFMC.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_attributes
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns a read-only copy of the Attributes dictionary as it is right now.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_setAttributes:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Set multiple attributes (key/value dictionaries) to Salesforce. See comments in -sfmc_setAttributeNamed.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_clearAttributesNamed:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Remove multiple attributes from Salesforce. See comments in -sfmc_setAttributeNamed.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_setDeviceToken:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Responsible for sending the Apple device token back to Salesforce. It marks the end of the token registration flow. If it is unable to reach Salesforce server, it will save the token and try again later.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_deviceToken
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns the device token as a NSString.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_appID
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns the Salesforce application ID.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_accessToken
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns the Salesforce application accessToken.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_deviceIdentifier
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns the unique device identifier that Salesforce will use to identify the device.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_setNotificationRequest:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Informs the SDK of the current notification.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_notificationRequest
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns the last notification delivered to the SDK.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_setNotificationUserInfo:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Informs the SDK of the current notification.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_notificationUserInfo
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns the user info of the last notification delivered to the SDK.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_setPushEnabled:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Developer override to set the state of push enablement to YES/NO. If set to NO, the application will not receive any push notifications once the Marketing Cloud server has been updated. When this value is NO, it takes precedence (overrides) the user notifications settings (i.e., setting this to NO will always disable push.) Conversely, if the user has notifications settings disabled, the developer cannot enable push via this method. A NO value from either source (user settings or developer interface) always wins.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_pushEnabled
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The current state of the developer’s push enablement override

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_getSDKState
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Outputs a formatted, easily readable block of text describing the current status of the SDK.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_setDebugLoggingEnabled:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Enable/Disable extra debug logging from the SDK.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_getDebugLoggingEnabled
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The current state of the debug logging flag in the SDK.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_refreshWithFetchCompletionHandler:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Ask MarketingCloudSDK to update its data. MarketingCloudSDK will throttle attempts based on the time since the last time this was called.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_setSignedString:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Add a signedString security token for registration security

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_signedString
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns the value of last stored signedString security token

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_isReady
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: BOOL indicating whether the SDK is ready to be used.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_isInitializing
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: BOOL indicating the SDK is in the process of being initialized.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_setEventDelegate:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Method to set a delegate class (adhering to the MarketingCloudSDKEventDelegate protocol) to implment methods for In-App Message lifecycle events.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_messageIdForMessage:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Extract a message identifier for an In-App Message dictionary (provided in the MarketingCloudSDKEventDelegate methods).

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_showInAppMessage:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: When called, instructs the SDK to attempt to display the In-App Message. This will cause the MarketingCloudSDKEventDelegate methods to be called, if implemented.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_setInAppMessageFontName:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: When called, sets the font for In-App Message display.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_track:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Method to track events, which could result in actions such as an In-App Message displaying.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_getAllMessages
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Get all active Inbox messages already downloaded from the MarketingCloud

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_getUnreadMessages
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Get unread active Inbox messages (already downloaded from the MarketingCloud)

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_getReadMessages
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Get active Inbox messages marked as read (already downloaded from the MarketingCloud)

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_getDeletedMessages
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Get active Inbox messages marked as deleted (already downloaded from the MarketingCloud)

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_getAllMessagesCount
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Get count of all active Inbox messages already downloaded from the MarketingCloud.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_getUnreadMessagesCount
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Get count of unread active Inbox messages (already downloaded from the MarketingCloud)

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_getReadMessagesCount
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Get count of active Inbox messages marked as read (already downloaded from the MarketingCloud)

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_getDeletedMessagesCount
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Get count of active Inbox messages marked as deleted (already downloaded from the MarketingCloud)

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_markMessageRead:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Mark a Inbox message as read.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_markMessageDeleted:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Mark an Inbox message as deleted.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_markMessageWithIdRead:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Mark a Inbox message as read using messageId.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_markMessageWithIdDeleted:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Mark an Inbox message as deleted using messageId.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_markAllMessagesRead
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Mark all Inbox messages as read.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_markAllMessagesDeleted
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Mark all Inbox messages as deleted.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_refreshMessages
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Reload and refresh Inbox messages from the MarketingCloud server.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_inboxMessagesTableViewDataSourceForTableView:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Create an instance of a basic UITableView data source to handle all loading for a simple view controller showing Inbox messages.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_inboxMessagesTableViewDelegateForTableView:dataSource:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Create an instance of a basic UITableView delegate to handle cell selection for a simple view controller showing Inbox messages.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_setPiIdentifier:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Set the identifier to associate with Predictive Intelligence data sent to Salesforce Marketing Cloud

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_piIdentifier
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns a read-only copy of the Analytics identity set

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_trackMessageOpened:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: When an Inbox message is opened (for instance, you implement an inbox and present the CloudPage URL in your webview) this method should be called with the Inbox message so that the MarketingCloudSDK can track the proper analytics and state of the message.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_trackPageViewWithURL:title:item:search:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Track page views within your application.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_trackCartContents:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Track cart contents within your application.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_trackCartConversion:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Track cart conversion within your application.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_cartItemDictionaryWithPrice:quantity:item:uniqueId:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Initialize a Cart Item dictionary for use in analytics.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_cartDictionaryWithCartItemDictionaryArray:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Initialize a Cart dictionary for use in analytics.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_orderDictionaryWithOrderNumber:shipping:discount:cart:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Initialize an Order dictionary for use in analytics.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_setLocationDelegate:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Method to set a delegate implementing the MarketingCloudSDKLocationDelegate.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_regionFromDictionary:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Method to convert a region dictionary returned from sfmc_shouldShowLocationMessage into a CLRegion

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_locationEnabled
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Determines the state of Location Services based on developer setting and OS-level permission. This is the preferred method for checking for location state.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_startWatchingLocation
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Use this method to initiate Location Services through the MobilePush SDK.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_stopWatchingLocation
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Use this method to disable Location Services through the MobilePush SDK.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_watchingLocation
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Use this method to determine if the SDK is actively monitoring location.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_lastKnownLocation
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: A dictionary version of the last known Location. The dictionary will contain two keys, latitude and longitude, which are NSNumber wrappers around doubles. Use doubleValue to retrieve.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.name: -sfmc_setURLHandlingDelegate:
Classes/MarketingCloudSDK.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Method to set a delegate implementing the MarketingCloudSDKURLHandlingDelegate.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKInboxMessagesDa.name: MarketingCloudSDKInboxMessagesDataSource
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKInboxMessagesDa.abstract: The MarketingCloudSDKInboxMessagesDataSource is an interface object for Inbox support. It was designed to be used as the datasource for a UITableView, and can be allocated and used as such without too much other customization. Of course, you are welcomed to use it any way you want other than that.

Classes/MarketingCloudSDKInboxMessagesDe.name: MarketingCloudSDKInboxMessagesDelegate
Classes/MarketingCloudSDKInboxMessagesDe.abstract: The MarketingCloudSDKInboxMessagesDelegate is an interface object for Inbox support. It was designed to be used as a simple delegate for a UITableView, and can be allocated and used as such without too much other customization. It only supports tableView:didSelectRowAtIndexPath: to offer (along with the data source) a VERY simple inbox implementation.
